description:
There are plenty of courses on how to create a product from start to finish and sell on Amazon. But there are no courses on just how to rank your products on Amazon via SEO (Search Engine Optimization), which is the most critical area needed to sell well on Amazon. In this course, we discuss only topics that impact your rankings and help you increase your sales velocity via Amazon. These topics are both intermediate and advanced level topics.

  • Areas Specific To Ranking Well On Amazon
  • How To Rank Any Product On Amazon
  • How To Maintain Your Rankings
  • Optimizing Your Listing For Sustained Rankings
  • Amazon SEO Ranking Factors
  • Reviews & Product Giveaways For Ranking
  • Specific Amazon SEO Case Studies
  • The Proper Way To Target 100's Of Keywords To Rank For
  • Bonus - Powerful Tools To Perform Amazon Keyword Research For Your Products
  • Bonus - How to Target Amazon Sponsored Ads (PPC) Keywords

By the end of this course, you will know everything required to rank any product you choose to sell on Amazon's platform. This is the most comprehensive Amazon SEO course and we're constantly adding more to the Advanced Section to ensure our students have the most up to date information.
title: Amazon SEO Seller: Rank Your Private Label Products With FBA
